lead_paragraph: Mike Tirico will take over part of Dan Patrick’s sports talk time slot on ESPN Radio.“The Mike Tirico Show” will start Thursday from 1 to 3 p.m. Eastern. Tirico serves as the play-by-play commentator for “Monday Night Football” and the N.B.A. finals on ESPN. He was one of the original hosts when ESPN Radio launched in 1992. Patrick announced in July that he was leaving ESPN after 18 years.
